segments.text: we are going out for dinner tonight . Are you coming , Betty ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not sure . I have to check my schedule . Where are you going ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: oh , Jake made a reservation at Friday's .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes , the one with the R $ D team . Is that a problem ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will never go out with him anymore .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: last time when we had dinner at the Smith's , it was a horrible experience . He had no manners at all !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: he made a lot of noises while eating . He talked with his mouth full and sipped loudly .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: are you kidding me ? How could he behave like that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: it is true . Everyone kept looking at him . It was so embarrassing as I was sitting right next to him .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: what a shame ! Didn't he realized that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have no idea . He seemed to enjoy the dinner very much .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: maybe he should really something about eating etiquette .
segments.speaker: S1
